column1: Little Goat Diner////On a Friday around 11AM
column2: this place was PACKED. I was dining alone and sat at the counter
column3: the typical spot at a diner for a loner. The food was delicious
column5: and the drinks were wonderful. My server was so pleasant and offered great suggestions. I would love to go here again and I could take a bath in the BBQ Maple Syrup!
